titleStmt.title: Invisibles, realities, demonstrated in the holy life and triumphant death of Mr. John Janeway, Fellow of King's Collegde in Cambridge. By James Janeway, Minister of the Gospel
titleStmt.author: Janeway, James, 1636?-1674.
Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.
Borset, Samuel.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Tho. Parkhurst, and are to be sold at the Bible and three Crowns in Cheapside neer Mercers Chappel, and at the Bible on London Bridge under the Gate,

notesStmt.note: "To the relations of Mr. James Janeway," is signed: Samuel Borset.
Caption title on p.1 reads: Invisible realities, demonstrated in the holy life and triumphant death of Master John Janeway, sometimes fellow of Kings-Colledge, Cambridge.
With four final advertisement leaves, signed N1-4. Text ends on I4.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Bible on London Bridge under the Gate
